participant_1.background:
My dogs are my most valued possessions.
I love my family, but they don't always understand my love for McDonald's or Mortal Kombat.
my favorite food is italian.
I can't resist a good salad from Aldi when I'm on the go.
i have a set of identical twin brothers.

participant_2.background:
Jasper may be jealous of my new Chevy.
i enjoy crosswords , crocheting , and football.
My worst nightmare is being fired from my internship.
I like to keep my social media use to a minimum, but I love honey bees!
my grandmother lives in my guesthouse.

content.text: Hello! It's 11pm, I'm hungry and my husband is asleep. What should I do?
If you don't want to wake your husband, you could make a salad. I love making salads. Do you have any favorite toppings?
I do! Aldi has a great premade salad with goat cheese, walnuts, dried cranberries, and balsamic vinaigrette. I love it.
I've never been to Aldi but I've heard good things! I love goat cheese too. I think I'll have to make myself a salad now.
It's the best! You can't beat the price. I wish I had some right now.
Me too! It's midnight here so I guess I'll have to wait until the morning.
I'm sure your grandmother would love to have you over for dinner. She's a great cook, right?
Yes, she is! She loves to cook for us.
Maybe you should go over there and have some dinner. I know I would if I were you!
I think I will. Thanks for the suggestion!
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.
You're the best! I'm going to go call my grandmother now.
Have fun! I'm sure you'll have a great time.
